General.Name: NOVITA SA
General.Description: Novita S.A. engages in the production and distribution of household, medical and sanitary, clothing, footwear, and technical nonwovens worldwide. The company provides spunlace and needlepunched products. It is also involved in rental related activities. The company's products are used in the personal care, household, technical, and medical sectors. Novita S.A. was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Zielona Góra, Poland. The company is a subsidiary of Tebesa Sp. z o.o.
